translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen,
this is the moment we've been waiting for. The presenta--
translation.fr: voici le moment que nous attendions tous…

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight?
-Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight! -[audience cheers]
Now, isn't this what it's all about, folks?
[boy 1] Come on, Daniel! Come on, Daniel!
-Fight! -[Johnny] Hyah!
[man 1] Come on, Daniel! Get him!
[referee] Turn. Kneel.
[man 2] Hey, Johnny, you're a cream puff!
Sweep the leg.
You have a problem with that?
No, Sensei.
No mercy.
[boy 1] All right, two points!
That's two points, LaRusso. Lawrence, nothing.
Ready? Fight!
[referee] One point, Lawrence!
[official] Point, Lawrence. 2-2.
[boy 2] Get him a body bag! Yeah!
-[referee] Illegal contact to the knee. -[boy 2] Finish him, Johnny!
translation.fr: - Contact illégal au genou. - Achève-le, Johnny !

translation.en: [announcer] Whoever wins the next point will be our new champion!
translation.fr: Le prochain à marquer sera le nouveau champion.

translation.en: You finish him, Johnny! Finish him!
[announcer] The new champion, Daniel LaRusso!
Hey, I'm Miguel. My family and I just moved into 109.
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Miguel. On vient d'emménager au 109.

translation.en: Great. More immigrants.
Actually, we're from Riverside.
I was wondering if you were having trouble with your water pressure,
translation.fr: Vous avez aussi un problème de pression d'eau ?

translation.en: 'cause I know our sink's being weird right now and…
Oh, bottles go in the blue bins.
Listen, Menudo, I've lived in this shithole for over ten years.
translation.fr: Écoute, menudo. Je vis dans ce trou à rats depuis dix ans.

translation.en: The pipe's don't work. The fountain's full of piss.
translation.fr: Pas de pression, fontaine pleine de pisse…

translation.en: The only good thing here is that I don't have to talk to anybody.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai pas à parler à qui que ce soit.

translation.en: So, nice knowing you.
OK, well…
have a nice day…
-[car door squeals loudly] -…I guess.
[Johnny] You've got to be kidding me.
Not another one.
♪ Ha ha, yeah! ♪
Hey.
[woman] Creep.
Sick.
-Hey! -[kid] Gotcha.
-What the hell is this? -Don't worry, it'll be level.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi, ça ? - Ce sera droit.

translation.en: I'm just lining it up.
You put it on the wrong wall! I said the wall across from the door.
translation.fr: C'est le mauvais mur. J'avais dit en face de la porte.

translation.en: -This is the wall across from the door. -Not that door, idiot. The door.
translation.fr: - C'est en face de la porte. - Pas cette porte, idiot. La porte.

translation.en: Just move the TV. I have company coming over.
Hold on. I'll have to fill the holes, remeasure, match the paint.
translation.fr: Attendez. Je dois reboucher les trous, mesurer, trouver la peinture.

translation.en: It'll take an hour to get to the hardware store.
That's not my problem.
I'm not the dummy who put the TV on, literally,
translation.fr: C'est pas moi, la débile qui a mis la télé

translation.en: the only wall in the house that a TV would not go.
translation.fr: sur le seul mur où elle irait pas.

translation.en: Why can't a TV go on this…
Look, I'll come first thing in the morning and put it just the way you want it.
translation.fr: Bon, je repasse demain et j'installe tout comme vous voulez.

translation.en: I just can't do it now.
That's just great. Not bad enough you took a shit in my powder room.
translation.fr: Génial. Chier dans mes cabinets n'a pas suffi.

translation.en: -You said that's where I should go. -I didn't know you'd take a shit!
translation.fr: - Vous m'avez autorisé à y aller. - Pas pour chier.

translation.en: OK, we'll figure this out, all right? Just quit bitching at me.
translation.fr: On va trouver une solution. Mais arrêtez de m'emmerder.

translation.en: What did you just call me?
No, no, no! I didn't call her a bitch. I said she was bitching at me.
translation.fr: Je l'ai pas traitée d'emmerdeuse, je lui ai dit qu'elle m'emmerdait.

translation.en: There's a difference.
You're firing me because of that bitch?
translation.fr: Tu me vires à cause de cette pute ?

translation.en: You know what? I hated this damn job anyway.
translation.fr: Je détestais ce job, en fait.

translation.en: You better pay me what you owe me, Mike.
translation.fr: Paie-moi ce que tu me dois, Mike.

translation.en: Mike?
[man on radio] Banzai!
[chuckles] I'm Daniel LaRusso.
And at LaRusso Auto, we kick the competi--
translation.fr: Chez LaRusso Auto, on éclate la…

translation.en: That one.
Aren't you gonna wear gloves?
[in Spanish] Where's the Pepto-Bismol?
[in Spanish] Over there.
Can you put that on a plate?
[in English] My grandma's not feeling well.
translation.fr: - Ma mamie se sent pas bien. - J'ai rien demandé.

translation.en: Didn't ask. C'mon, what's Spanish for "Just give me my damn slice"?
translation.fr: - Ma mamie se sent pas bien. - J'ai rien demandé. Comment on dit "file-moi la part" en espagnol ?

translation.en: [in English] What did you just say?
-What did he say? -You don't wanna know.
translation.fr: - Il a dit quoi ? - C'est rien.

translation.en: -I know it's something bad. Just tell me. -Uh, he said you have a tiny…
translation.fr: - C'était méchant, dis-le-moi. - Il a dit que vous aviez une petite…

translation.en: He said I have a tiny wang?
Tell him he has a tiny wang.
-[in English] I speak English, asshole. -Oh really?
translation.fr: Je parle anglais, ducon. Ah ouais ?

translation.en: Yo, Brucks, get the light beer this time. Gotta cut weight for the meet.
translation.fr: Brucks, prends de la bière light. Il faut que je sèche.

translation.en: -Hundo P, son! -[boy 2] Damn right.
[boy 3] Man, you should get some condoms too.
Finish up and then beat it!
-Excuse me? -[woman] This is my mart.
You ain't hustling no coin at my mart.
translation.fr: Tu fais pas la manche devant ma boutique.

translation.en: I'm not hustling. I'm not homeless!
translation.fr: Je fais pas la manche. Je suis pas à la rue.

translation.en: That's my car.
[boy 2] What the hell are you doing? Why you gotta blow up my spot?
translation.fr: Tu fais quoi ? Pourquoi tu nous balances ?

translation.en: -[Miguel] Dude, I-- -He thought we were in college.
[Miguel] I didn't know you were trying to buy beer. Sorry.
translation.fr: Je savais pas que vous achetiez des bières.

translation.en: -[Brucks] Yes, let's go. -[boy 3] What the hell are you doing?
-Ooh, what do we got here? -[boy 4] What do you got? Pepto.
translation.fr: - Fais voir ce que t'as. - Du Pepto-Bismol.

translation.en: [boy 3] Oh shit. Someone has frickin' diarrhea!
translation.fr: Merde, le mec a la diarrhée.

translation.en: [Brucks] Hey, we should call him 'Rhea.
Give it back, dude. It's for my grandma!
[boy 2] Oh, it's for your grandma? Shit, I'm sorry, man.
translation.fr: OK, pour ta grand-mère ? Je suis désolé, mec.

translation.en: Hey, you want it? Hey, you can take all that shit.
-Take that! Yeah. -[boys laughing]
Bitch.
Asshole.
-[Brucks] Ooh! -[boy 2] What'd you say, 'Rhea?
I… I didn't say anything.
[boy 4] That's brute, Ky.
[boy 3] Yeah. Or what?
-[Ky] You crying? Where you going, pussy? -[Miguel groans]
-[boys snicker] -[Johnny] Hey!
Watch the car, man.
Who's this dude?
-Just leave the dork alone. -[Ky] What?
translation.fr: - Fous la paix au nerd. - Hein ?

translation.en: You see this guy? Eating his dinner at the mini-mart like a bum.
translation.fr: Regardez-le. Il mange devant la boutique comme un clodo.

translation.en: -[boys laugh] -[Ky] Wait, I think I know this guy. He's the jerk-off that cleaned my dad's septic tank.
translation.fr: Je connais ce type. Il a nettoyé la fosse septique de mon père.

translation.en: That explains why he smells like shit.
Trust me, you are pissing off the wrong guy on the wrong day, all right?
translation.fr: Vous emmerdez le mauvais gars au mauvais moment.

translation.en: -[Ky] Really? -Yeah, really.
Get the hell out of here, loser.
Let's get him.
[Brucks] Get off me!
-Holy shit. How did you-- -[Ky roars]
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.fr: Ben alors ? On a du mal à respirer ?

translation.en: Is that all you got, ladies?
[Brucks] Come on, Ky.
-Let's go. -[Ky] Get off me!
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.fr: Ben alors ? On a du mal à respirer ?

translation.en: [cop] Hey, get off the kid!
-[Johnny screams] -[Miguel] Hey! It's not his fault!
[Miguel] Hey, I just wanted to say thank you.
All right, well, you said it.
So, last night, was that, like, Tae Kwon Do or jujitsu or MMA or something?
translation.fr: Hier soir, c'était du taekwondo, du ju-jitsu, des MMA ?

translation.en: It's karate. Old-school karate.
-Do you think you could teach me? -What? No.
Come on. When school starts, those guys will make my life miserable.
translation.fr: À la rentrée, ces mecs vont me mettre la misère.

translation.en: It's not my problem.
Look, if I just knew a little bit of what you knew, then I would be--
translation.fr: Si vous m'appreniez quelques trucs, je pourrais…

translation.en: Forget it. I don't do karate anymore, all right? Besides, I need to find a job.
translation.fr: Oublie, je fais plus de karaté. Et je dois trouver du boulot.

translation.en: Well, you could open your own karate school.
translation.fr: Ouvrez votre propre école de karaté.

translation.en: -It's called a dojo. -You could open your own dojo.
translation.fr: - On dit dojo. - Ouvrez votre propre dojo.

translation.en: Look, I'm not getting into this with you.
I'm not even sure I'm allowed to be around kids right now.
translation.fr: Je sais même pas si je peux approcher les gamins.

translation.en: All right, you want my advice? Stop being so annoying.
translation.fr: Tu veux un conseil ? Deviens moins chiant.

translation.en: Maybe you'll stop getting your ass kicked.
You got Encore?
Yes, ma'am. That's correct, Your Honor.
translation.fr: C'est exact, Votre Honneur. Elle est…

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
You know those little red stickers that say "further reduced"?
translation.fr: Tu vois les petites étiquettes rouges avec "prix réduit" dessus ?

translation.en: That means "spoiled."
You know that, right?
You're eating bad meat, boy.
translation.fr: Tu manges de la viande périmée.

translation.en: What the are you doing in my apartment, Sid?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fous chez moi, Sid ?

translation.en: Oh, that's some "thank you."
Who do you think bailed you out? Again.
translation.fr: Qui a encore payé ta caution, à ton avis ?

translation.en: I never asked you for anything.
I think that little incident at Applebee's
translation.fr: Je pensais que l'incident du Applebee's

translation.en: would've taught you to keep your hands to yourself.
You know…
when I met your mom,
she really knocked my socks off.
Beautiful.
Tan.
Tight.
-[groans] -[Sid] Little did I know I'd be taking care of her schmuck kid forever.
translation.fr: Mais j'imaginais pas devoir m'occuper de son crétin de fils à vie.

translation.en: [Johnny] Yeah, Sid, you were the stepfather of the century.
translation.fr: Tu as été le beau-père du siècle, Sid.

translation.en: Well, high praise, coming from a world-class daddy like you.
translation.fr: Un beau compliment de la part d'un papa exemplaire comme toi.

translation.en: How old is Robby now, 15, 16?
translation.fr: Quel âge a Robby ? 15 ans ? 16 ans ?

translation.en: -When's the last time you saw him? -Just get the hell out of here.
I'll get the hell out when I'm goddamn good and ready!
translation.fr: Je me casserai quand j'en ai envie !

translation.en: -[woman] Sid. -[Sid] What?
-Blood pressure! -Keep watching your bullshit judge show,
translation.fr: - Sid, votre tension. - Quoi ? Regarde plutôt ton émission débile, tu veux, Rhonda ?

translation.en: will you, Rhonda?
translation.fr: Regarde plutôt ton émission débile, tu veux, Rhonda ?

translation.en: And stay out of this!
translation.fr: Ne te mêle pas de ça.

translation.en: Jesus, God.
This is why I'm here.
translation.fr: Je suis venu te donner ça.

translation.en: What's this?
You know, I told your mama I'd take care of you always,
translation.fr: J'ai dit à ta mère que je m'occuperais de toi toute ma vie,

translation.en: but in this case,
I think even she would cut me some slack.
translation.fr: je pense qu'elle me lâchera la grappe.

translation.en: I'm buying you out of my life.
translation.fr: Prends cet argent et sors de ma vie.

translation.en: I'd rather be homeless than take money from you.
Oh, well, hell. Yeah, OK.
Rhonda!
Lunchtime!
Call Art's.
See if they got the belly lox.
I'd say… get your life in order, but, uh…
translation.fr: Je te dirais bien de mettre un peu d'ordre dans ta vie, mais…

translation.en: at this point, you're like the meat in your fridge.
translation.fr: tu es comme la viande dans ton frigo.

translation.en: Chappy! Chappy, where are you?
Just put in that tape. That's an order!
translation.fr: Mets la cassette, c'est un ordre. Te soucie pas de moi.

translation.en: -Nothing you can do about me. -[man 1] Chappy, I want to help you!
translation.fr: Mets la cassette, c'est un ordre. Te soucie pas de moi. Chappy, je veux t'aider ! Où es-tu ?

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.fr: Chappy, je veux t'aider ! Où es-tu ?

translation.en: [Chappy] Climb high, like I told you!
translation.fr: Monte haut comme je te l'ai dit.

translation.en: -[alarm buzzing on television] -Doug, I ain't gonna make it.
-[explosion on television] -Chappy!
[man on tape] A bunch of things must have gone wrong if you're listening to this.
translation.fr: Si tu écoutes ça, c'est que ça s'est mal passé.

translation.en: Whatever happened, I know you must be real scared.
translation.fr: En tout cas… tu dois avoir très peur.

translation.en: Right now, you're probably filled with all the doubts in the world.
translation.fr: À l'heure qu'il est, tu dois être assailli de doutes.

translation.en: But I'm gonna tell you something, Dougie.
God doesn't give people things He doesn't want 'em to use.
translation.fr: Dieu ne nous dote que de ce qu'il juge utile.

translation.en: And He gave you the touch.
translation.fr: Et il t'a doté… du toucher.

translation.en: It's a power you have inside of you,
translation.fr: C'est un pouvoir qui est en toi.

translation.en: down there where you keep your guts, boy.
It's all you need to blast your way in and get back what they took from you.
translation.fr: Sers-t'en pour foncer et récupérer ce qu'ils t'ont pris.

translation.en: Banzai!
Daniel LaRusso here for LaRusso Auto,
translation.fr: Ici Daniel LaRusso de LaRusso Auto,

translation.en: bringing you specials on all of our inventory.
translation.fr: avec des offres sur tout notre parc automobile.

translation.en: We have an excess of Jeep Grand Cherokees priced to go.
translation.fr: Nous vous proposons des Jeep Grand Cherokee d'occasion,

translation.en: Get a lease for only…
Nah. Make that… Chop!
Yes, we are chopping prices on all of our Hondas, Nissans, Acuras, and Audis.
translation.fr: Nous avons une sélection de Honda, Nissan, Acura et Audi à prix taillé.

translation.en: So come visit any of our locations in Tarzana, Woodland Hills,
translation.fr: Visitez nos concessions à Tarzana, Woodland Hills,

translation.en: North Hollywood or Sherman Oaks.
And as always, every customer leaves with their very own bonsai tree.
translation.fr: Chaque client repart avec son bonsaï, c'est la coutume.

translation.en: LaRusso Auto Group. We kick the competition.
translation.fr: Groupe Auto LaRusso. On éclate la compétition.

translation.en: -Yeah! -All right!
-[man] Hai! -[students] Hyah! -Hai! -Hyah! -Hai! -Hyah!
♪ These daydreams ♪
[Johnny] I got second place.
translation.fr: - J'ai fini deuxième. - Pas de quoi être fier !

translation.en: [man] Second place is no place! You're off the team!
translation.fr: - J'ai fini deuxième. - Pas de quoi être fier ! - Tu dégages. - J'ai tout donné.

translation.en: -[Johnny] That sucks! I did my best. -What did you say?
translation.fr: - Tu dégages. - J'ai tout donné. - Quoi ? - J'ai tout donné.

translation.en: -[Johnny] I said I did my best! -You're nothing! You lost! You're a loser!
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - J'ai tout donné. Espèce de loser bon à rien !

translation.en: -[Johnny] No, you're the loser, man. -Oh, I'm the loser, huh?
translation.fr: - C'est vous, le loser. - Ah oui ?

translation.en: Yeah.
-Now who's the loser? -[Johnny] You know, you're really sick.
translation.fr: - Et maintenant ? - Vous êtes vraiment taré.

translation.en: -Hey! [Johnny choking] -Hey, come on!
-Hey, what are you doing? -Don't…
How does second place feel now, huh?
translation.fr: Toujours fier de ta deuxième place ?

translation.en: -[boy 1] Come on! He can't breathe. -Mind your business!
[boy 2] You're gonna kill him! [boy 1] Sensei, please! You're hurting him!
translation.fr: - Vous allez le tuer. - Sensei, vous lui faites mal.

translation.en: [man] How does second place feel now, huh?
translation.fr: Toujours fier de ta deuxième place ?

translation.en: -[girl gasps] -Oh my God.
I told you, you shouldn't be on your phone.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit de poser ton portable.

translation.en: -What the-- -[liquor bottle smashes]
-What are we gonna do? -We have to call the police.
translation.fr: - On fait quoi ? - On appelle la police.

translation.en: -We can't! My parents will kill me! -What the hell are you doing?
translation.fr: - Non, mes parents vont me tuer. - Mais ça va pas ?

translation.en: -What are you doing? Open the door! -[girls screaming] Open the door!
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que vous foutez ? Ouvrez la porte !

translation.en: Drive! Drive!
Hey! Where do you think you're going? Where do you think you're going?
translation.fr: Vous croyez aller où, comme ça ?

translation.en: Shit!
Oh, come o--
-Take care of her. She's a classic. -Mm-hmm.
-Hey, where do I pick it up? -It's on the card.
translation.fr: - Je la récupère où ? - C'est écrit.

translation.en: [Johnny] LaRusso?
No, no, no.
Hey! Hey!
Oh, come on.
How you doing? Would you be interested in--
No.
[woman] You're all set.
-Have a great day. -[man 1] Thank you.
Hi, welcome to LaRusso.
How can I help you?
Hi, I just need to pick up my car.
I'm in a bit of a hurry.
Oh, this came in last night?
It'll be a couple of weeks, but we'll call you with an estimate.
translation.fr: Comptez quelques semaines. On vous enverra un devis.

translation.en: No, my car was not supposed to come here. I want it towed to a different body shop.
translation.fr: Elle aurait pas dû arriver ici, je veux la faire réparer ailleurs.

translation.en: Why?
We have the number one service team in the Valley.
translation.fr: Nous avons la meilleure équipe de la vallée.

translation.en: We beat all prices.
We kick the competition.
I've heard it a million times. I just prefer to do my business elsewhere.
translation.fr: Oui, je sais. Mais je préfère aller voir ailleurs.

translation.en: [man 2] And here are the watering instructions.
Thanks for being returning customers.
Before you go, Mr. LaRusso wanted to thank you personally.
translation.fr: M. LaRusso tient à vous remercier personnellement.

translation.en: Let me go get him.
-Can you hurry it up? I gotta go. -[woman] Hold on.
translation.fr: - Vite, je dois y aller. - Une seconde.

translation.en: Um, it says your car is in one of our intake lots.
translation.fr: Votre voiture est sur le parking.

translation.en: -I'll figure out which one. -You know what? I'll come back tomorrow.
translation.fr: - Reste à savoir lequel. - Je repasserai demain.

translation.en: [woman] But, sir, I--
[Daniel] Johnny?
Johnny Lawrence! I… I… I knew it was you!
translation.fr: Johnny Lawrence. J'étais sûr que c'était toi.

translation.en: Holy… How the hell are you?
-Hey, man. -[chuckles]
[Daniel] Oh my God, look at you.
translation.fr: Ça alors, tu as bonne mine.

translation.en: You still got those golden locks, eh?
translation.fr: Tu as toujours tes boucles blondes ?

translation.en: God, this is crazy. How you been?
translation.fr: C'est fou. Comment tu vas, depuis ?

translation.en: -Great, man. Thanks, I've been great. -That's great.
Anoush, come here! Louie, get over here! I want you to meet somebody.
translation.fr: Anoush, Louie, venez voir. J'ai quelqu'un à vous présenter.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -No, no, no. This is Johnny Lawrence.
translation.fr: - Je dois y aller. - C'est Johnny Lawrence.

translation.en: He and I go way back. Right, buddy?
translation.fr: Nous deux, ça remonte, pas vrai ?

translation.en: This guy was the toughest dude in my high school.
translation.fr: C'était le mec le plus balaise du lycée.

translation.en: When I first moved here from Jersey, he and I… we got into a little bit.
translation.fr: Quand je suis arrivé du New Jersey, on s'est un peu bagarrés.

translation.en: This guy really had it in for me.
translation.fr: Il m'a mené la vie dure.

translation.en: Well, you did move in on my girl.
Well, she actually wasn't really your girl anymore, was she?
translation.fr: Enfin, ce n'était plus vraiment ta copine, à vrai dire.

translation.en: I mean…
All right. That's all water under the bridge.
translation.fr: De l'eau a coulé sous les ponts.

translation.en: Wait. Is this the karate guy, the guy from the tournament?
translation.fr: C'était ton adversaire au tournoi de karaté ?

translation.en: Oh, this is the guy whose ass you kicked.
translation.fr: C'est le mec que tu as battu.

translation.en: [Daniel] Uh, listen, it was a really close match.
translation.fr: Oui, enfin c'était un match serré.

translation.en: But if you wanna get technical… I kicked his face.
translation.fr: Pour être précis, je l'ai étalé d'un coup de pied à la tête.

translation.en: -[Daniel, Louie laughing] -I'm just busting your chops.
It was an illegal kick.
Oh, illegal? Really? Come on. What about that elbow to my knee?
translation.fr: Illégal ? Et ton coup de coude au genou ?

translation.en: Yeah, I got a warning. You got the win.
translation.fr: J'ai été sanctionné, tu as gagné.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! No fighting in the showroom, guys.
[Daniel] Come on. All right, back to work.
-Nice meeting you. -Get back to work.
Enough reminiscing, right?
So, what brings you in? You're looking for a new a ride?
He wants his car towed to a different body shop.
translation.fr: Il veut envoyer sa voiture ailleurs.

translation.en: Oh no, Johnny. We got the best prices in town.
translation.fr: Non, on pratique les meilleurs prix.

translation.en: That crook at Cole's on Van Nuys, he'll try to screw you over.
translation.fr: Cet escroc de Cole à Van Nuys va t'entuber.

translation.en: Sheila, let me see the estimate.
A Pontiac?
-Firebird? -Yeah.
Wow, someone did a real number on this thing.
translation.fr: Ils l'ont pas loupée, on dirait.

translation.en: Maybe it's time for an upgrade. Why don't we walk the lot?
translation.fr: Et si tu montais en gamme ?

translation.en: I'll give you a deal on a certified pre-owned--
I just want my car.
All right, all right. You got it, all right?
Let me see how low I can get this repair.
translation.fr: Je vais voir si je peux te faire un prix.

translation.en: Friends and family… my own personal code.
translation.fr: Famille et amis… Mon code personnel.

translation.en: You know what? It's on the house.
-No way. I don't need your charity. -No, you'd be doing me a favor.
translation.fr: - Je veux pas de faveur. - Tu me rendrais service.

translation.en: Our guys aren't used to working on a car like this.
They could use the practice. You could use the repairs.
translation.fr: Ils se font la main, tu en profites.

translation.en: -This is a win-win. -I said I'll handle it.
All right.
OK, but it's… John, it's gonna cost more than the car is worth.
translation.fr: Ça va te coûter plus cher que la voiture elle-même.

translation.en: Listen, don't worry about it. It's my pleasure, all right?
translation.fr: Bon, ne te prends la tête. Ça me fait plaisir.

translation.en: -All right. -OK? Just hang here a second.
I got something for you. One minute.
Fuck.
-Hey, Dad! -[Daniel] Look who's here.
-[screaming] -What are you doing? Open the door!
-I'm good. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.fr: - Ça va. - Dites-moi que je rêve…

translation.en: Of course. Go ahead. In the office.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Va dans le bureau.

translation.en: -[girl] See you later. -OK.
Hey, Johnny, wait up!
Johnny! Wait up.
Every customer gets one.
And, hey, look, I don't blame you for what happened back in the day.
translation.fr: Et au fait, je ne t'en veux pas pour ce qui est arrivé.

translation.en: All right, I know that wasn't you. It was Cobra Kai.
translation.fr: C'est la faute de Cobra Kai, pas la tienne.

translation.en: We're all better off without it, am I right?
Take care of yourself, and I'll call you when the car's ready, OK?
translation.fr: Prends soin de toi. Je t'appelle quand la voiture est prête.

translation.en: This is crazy! You look… You look… It's good to see you, man.
translation.fr: C'est fou. Tu as vraiment… Ça fait plaisir.

translation.en: Are you sure you're ready?
'Cause once you go down this path, there's no turning back.
translation.fr: Tu ne pourras plus faire marche arrière.

translation.en: -You're gonna be my karate teacher? -No.
translation.fr: - Vous serez mon prof de karaté ? - Non.

translation.en: I'm gonna be your sensei.
I'm gonna teach you the style of karate that was taught to me,
translation.fr: Je vais t'enseigner le karaté que j'ai appris,

translation.en: a method of fighting your pussy generation desperately needs.
translation.fr: la méthode de combat dont ta génération de fiottes a besoin.

translation.en: -[man] Good luck. It's all yours. -All right.
translation.fr: - Bonne chance. C'est à vous. - OK.

translation.en: I'm not just gonna teach you how to conquer your fears.
translation.fr: Tu n'apprendras pas qu'à surmonter tes peurs.

translation.en: I'm gonna teach you how to awaken the snake within you.
translation.fr: Mais à surmonter le serpent qui sommeille en toi.

translation.en: And once you do that,
translation.fr: Quand tu auras réussi, c'est toi qui inspireras la peur.

translation.en: you'll be the one who's feared.
translation.fr: Quand tu auras réussi, c'est toi qui inspireras la peur. FRAPPE LE PREMIER, FRAPPE FORT SANS PITIÉ

translation.en: You'll build strength.
You'll learn discipline.
And when the time is right,
you'll strike back.
